subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: The South Africa captain, John Smit, put the blame on himself for his team's last-gasp 29-22 rugby loss to the All Blacks that allowed New Zealand to claim the Tri-Nations crown.
snippet: The South Africa captain, John Smit, put the blame on himself for his team's last-gasp 29-22 rugby loss to the All Blacks that allowed New Zealand to claim the Tri-Nations crown.
